website_summaries.verdict: Easy to install shades with 2 different shade levels to block more or less sun.
pros: Easy to use and install by sticking to the inside of your car windows
Includes 2 transparent shades and 2 semi-transparent shades, both 20 inches by 12 inches, depending on your shade needs
cons: Some had wrinkles that wouldn't go away after installing

customer_reviews.title: Another necessary but great car item
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great shade! It sticks to your window like Saran Wrap. It is very translucent and it gives a lot of shade even though it seems so easy to see through. I attached a pic to show how much shade is on my arm. This is so helpful to be able to shield a little ones face or to keep an arm from getting sunburned on long trips. Hope this review is helpful to you...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! See video how to fold it back!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product but I had to figure out how to fold it back. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RicardoATB

customer_reviews.title: They work just like you said they would - no gimmicks, no false ads, just truth, i like that!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it covers me while i sit in the truck waiting for my husband at the grocery store. They work perfectly and the pouch is great for holding them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Truly madly

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years & counting
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my car 2.5 years ago. They work very well! They've been tossed on the floor, stepped on, moved between vehicles multiple times... and they still work like a charm. Since they get a little dirty on the floor, etc I do have to put some water on the sticky side occasionally to get them to stick back up again.
customer_reviews.author: ahansen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I was skeptical about a sunshade without suction cups, but these are fantastic. I put them on my windows and haven’t had to worry about them falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shade works as it was advertised. I did not think it would work because I could not imagine how it was going to stick in the window. My windows have security sheets and even then there were no problems installing them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aravena

customer_reviews.title: Best sun shade!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sun shade IMO. - no suctions needed so you don't worry about dropping/losing them. Also, you can put the shades on or take them out easily and quickly. - dark enough to cover the sun and still easy to see through. - the size and the thickness are perfect. You will get 4 of them. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Skeptical but now VERY HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, I was skeptical about whether this would adhere to the glass after repeated use BUT IT DOES! We took it on a 4,000 mile road trip to California to tour the Tesla factory and were we ever glad we had these sun shades. They are a quality product at a reasonable price and live up to all the Seller's claims. The directions say you might need to rub a damp cloth over the glass to get static adhesion but never once did we ever need to do that. And soooo much better than using those little rubber suction cups that rapidly deteriorate from direct exposure to UV in sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: What Iwas looking for
customer_reviews.text: The two that are the darker of the set are perfect for to shade the backseat as I travel with my dog. There are other companies that say the shade is a grade of 80, but it is not. Im happy with the two darker shades in this pack. I bought a second pack so to have 4 of the darker ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tzoumis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 other products but failed miserably... But, this one works! Stick very well. I felt significant difference in the temperature inside of the vehicle. I am living in the Southern California. Yes, it is necessary to drive in the So Cal traffic!
customer_reviews.author: Marie F.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: These shades arrived folded up as shown in the product photos. However, in the month I've owned them, they never fully flatten. This means they're constantly falling off the windows. 0/5 would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life???
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our best purchases ever. I seem to always be in the sun, no matter which direction we travel. We used these while we were driving on our last vacation and loved them! My husband easily saw through them and I was finally out of the sun. They just stick to your window like magic! You get four in a package, two are shady but easy to see through and two are much more dense. We used the two lesser ones and loved them! They aren't flimsy and are super easy to fold. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Overachiever

customer_reviews.title: Ambulance crews best friend
customer_reviews.text: This ain’t for kids y’all. When you work EMS darkness is key. So buy these and create yourself a cave of comfort. It also works when you’re a shorty like me and the sun visor is too high. I don’t like that there are 2 different shades though. I need all dark.
customer_reviews.author: EMTKT

customer_reviews.title: Five and plus Stars.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. The dark one effectively block the sunshine but one can still look through it. I don't need to cover the whole window but only the sun spot, which makes me check for blind spot without a problem. I am using them to my Tesla Model X, which has a huge front windshield. I can move them along the windshield wherever I need to block the sun light. I like to give a 5+ star rating. BTW, I don't understand why some reviewers saying it's too dark. Because that what we need. Also it came with two less dark. I love them and I am to order more as the Christmas white elephant gifts.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome working Sun Shades
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. I have used in one of the hottest day in California. It was 120 F outside but these sun shades are awesome. These stick to glasses and save UV rays inside car. These also keep car less hit comparing to other sun shades. Awesome loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick And Easy
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I’m a truck driver and I deal with early morning and early evening sun from all angles every day. These clings are quick and easy to stick on and they cover a large enough area that I don’t have to keep adjusting them. The picture was taken when it was 24 degrees Fahrenheit outside so temperature doesn’t effect the cling.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order, bought as gift and really excellent product. Blocks out the sunlight and the darker pair great for kids at the rear. Arrived ahead of schedule. Great company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: asiaellie

customer_reviews.title: Static is the way to go beats suction cups
customer_reviews.text: I've previously purchased the suction cup ones and they suck. These stick to the window by static. All you have to do is press them up against the window and thats it, it stays up. It also allows enough amount of light thru while providing privacy. At night you won't be able to see in but you'll be able to see out. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Herman L.

customer_reviews.title: Mesh not dark
customer_reviews.text: In the picture advertising the sun screen look dark but when receiving it not dark it very light. The sun go through and my skin feels hot. This sun screen on the back has a thick layer of plastic liner that help stick to the windows but beware this cause your vision and visibility range blur and is unsafe for driving.
customer_reviews.author: SuPeRMaN

customer_reviews.title: They're great for my dash cam also...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I really like these sun shades. I use them for all of my windows and I put one right in front of my dash cam. The only problems that I have with these are the ones that I create when I roll the windows down sometimes and I forget the shades are up. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: LooksCanKill You

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed when I opened them & none would stick to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I opened them & none would stick to the window. I specifically bought them based on th reviews & wanted them for my toddler as a shade. Unfortunately it didn’t work. They were bent & did not stick or cling to the window at all.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: The best sunshades I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these offer great sun protection (and includes 2 of each thickness of fabric, so you can choose) - but they are the easiest sunshades EVER to apply to a window. Because they use static cling, you can peel them off the window and stick them back up whenever you need to. No suction cups that fall down, no frustration with needing to roll down a window and not wanting to have to readjust the shade. I simply love them. Great value is just an added bonus with four included. (And the great little pouch makes them perfect to stick in the glovebox when not in use!)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for south-facing kitchen decorative windows through which the summer sun pours unrelentingly if left uncovered
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sun shades for 2 small rectangular decorative windows in my kitchen that face south. Great to have the light during the winter, but summer afternoons are a killer--previously I was sticking pieces of cardboard in to block the hot, bright sun. These sun shades are a big too short in length for my windows, but I will be using two in each window (yes, I liked them so much I bought a second set!).
customer_reviews.author: IvaluevalueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: We live in TX. It burns whenever we go out. Horrible fatigue after a small car trip. A/C can only do so much and we still burn like Sarah Connor in T2. We installed these shades today and let me tell you, it was amazing. My daughter was so happy that she wasnt being burnt by the sun glare. My husband usually gets migraines but today he was totally fine! Not to mention it stayed cool in our car. We noticed we weren't all hot and sticky as usual. I can't recommend these enough. They're easy to install and remove as well. I'm going to order another set as back up!
customer_reviews.author: Mona James

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Here in Houston TX Is 100 degrees F . Super hot and sunny . As you can see my roof has also a tent shade and is not that dark as this . I do recommend it to purchase is work the price. Also 2 comes really dark shade and the other 2 is a little lighter but it does the job, for this sunny summer. 😎
customer_reviews.author: Elias Sales

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: My son don't have complaints about the sun bugging him anymore and I love how it keeps me cool and don't feel my arms burning.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hot desert city and have to drive around a lot for my job. I drive a rental car that my job provides me since I drive around so much. Rentals usually do not come with tinted windows and now I don't have to put up with clear windows on 100+F degree weather. I was getting tanned on my arms/hands from just driving around even though I am diligent about wearing sunblock and now these provide enough shade for me that I am not. They easily stick on and off so when I am done with the rental car, I can easily take them off with me and use for the next car.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: 3 fit truck rear window
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical of these but tried them because of the reviews. I needed something to block sun through the rear window of a Dodge Ram 1500 with a sliding center. Three of these work perfectly for the window! They stick great but I do struggle to get them folded back up. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Sunshades.
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical when purchasing this but was very happy i did. I have zero tinting in my car and was driving from CA to N.C and was in need of shade for myself and my dogs. Long story short the cling on them is fab. I readjusted them daily and thet worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: principessa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: So your child can still take these off the window. If you are looking for one they can't pull off good luck, I don't think that exists. I love that these stick on and stay on, as long as little fingers don't pull them off. There are no suction cups, which is great no small pieces to end up in mouths. They were fast and prompt shipping. Great service. They are large and fit well in our windows we have a Toyota Prius V. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: maggieb

customer_reviews.title: Great shades...well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these....I have them in all my cars. It's amazing how much it helps after a car is sitting for hours in the heat and leaving and my car is not blazing hot. I do have a front windshielf cover as well. But when driving and the sun is pounding in hitting people....putting these up cuts that heat significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never reviewed a product on/for Amazon before, but this is worth my time. We live in central Arizona. There are restrictions for vehicle window tints here and there may be restrictions where you live too. Find out. That said, the sun is brutal here and getting worse. Using these Kinder Fluff Car Window Shades helps to shade precious cargo. They are easy to press on to the window and easy to fold back up to put in their case. I thought the price was reasonable and I’ll buy another set as gifts for loved ones this Holiday Season.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Powers-Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love these! They block out SO much sun. And, it's awesome how great they stick to the windows. Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have product for planes, trains, automobiles
customer_reviews.text: These shades are brilliant. They combined the ease of use of a plastic sheet with the diffusion of a screen. Just a great product! Love the choice of dark shade/light shade too. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: i am very happy about the purchase
customer_reviews.text: great shade for the semi-trans one . the transparent one is great for the rear window. just put another order.
customer_reviews.author: shu

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and removal! Sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and uninstall! Very effective at keeping the sun out!
customer_reviews.author: Scoob

customer_reviews.title: My favorite side shades so far.
customer_reviews.text: Living in southern AZ shade is more precious that platinum. So I've been using the life out of these things for months. They continually stick up reliably and give me more shade for the front seats while my car sits around all day. Front shade, side shades, rear tint. Yeah, I'm that guy.
customer_reviews.author: BS AZ

customer_reviews.title: Best quality at a best price!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to install and car is 80% cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: I am totally puzzled by these reviews. When I took mine out of the packet, they would not lay flat. They stay shaped like an hourglass (pinched in the middle) but still provided decent coverage. However, it becomes more mishapen with sun exposure. I’m assuming the sun warps the plastic side. After a year, they are so distorted they won’t stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fiend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Clings great and blocks sun. I love that it comes with 3 so that I have it when I watch my friend's child as well. Easy to remove and put back up, but stays well on the window.
customer_reviews.author: KarinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a decent sun shade!
customer_reviews.text: These are the THIRD set of window shades I've purchased in 2 years, and are by far the best. The shade is much darker, and allow for more shade for my 2 year old. The size is larger too, so they fit nicely on the back windows of my Subaru Forester and my Toyota Corolla. They do adhere to the window with basically a thick saran wrap, and that can get tricky when you forget they are there and roll down your windows (which I've been known to do!) Overall, I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Seattlemom38

customer_reviews.title: Chintzy junk that will have you skunked
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t like this product at all. If you’re into quality look elsewhere. These wouldn’t stick and kept falling down. No wonder we are in a climate-change crisis... chintzy junk like this is crowding the landfills all around the world. Unethical humans turning tricks for an easy buck... I get so mad when I get skunked like this. Why oh why did I think saving a couple of bucks was ever a good idea... buy quality then gift it to your friends who have kids- leave this where it belongs on the Amazon shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: SUN SHADE FOR YOUR LOVE ONES
customer_reviews.text: since long time i was looking for really good sun shade. at last i found and this the one for me .now i can use for my grand daughters AND MY LOVELY LIFE PARTNER. this product is as described. i love it. thank you so much girish patel
customer_reviews.author: G. patel

customer_reviews.title: provided a bit of shade but not as much as i would of liked also i made the mistake of rolling the window ...
customer_reviews.text: the shade made the window greasy looking when i removed it. provided a bit of shade but not as much as i would of liked also i made the mistake of rolling the window down while screen was attached and it crumpled and i was unable to bend back to normal position. my fault. had to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for a few months now. They don’t provide good protection and also have stopped staying on properly. I have ordered some of those that will go over the window. Hopefully those will work better.
customer_reviews.author: tine86

customer_reviews.title: Love 😍 these sun shades!
customer_reviews.text: “I bought two packages of this product because I was in desperate need of sun shades for my car. Upon reading the reviews and the excellent price I decided to buy them and hope for the best. To my delight, the transaction was outstanding and the product is amazing! The sun is blocked as promised and the ease of installation & removal is extremely easy. I have had compliments and inquiries of where I bought them. I highly recommend this product. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: GrethelV

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality, bit to dark to see through well ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a good quality, bit to dark to see through well and one of the 3 came bent out of shape...
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Kat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunshades!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sunshades! And I have tried many! They are smallish so plan on two or three on a front car window. I use them on my SUV to keep my dogs cool. It takes three on the front window and one each on the side windows. I did get two sets. They stick very well and stay put. You can't, or I can't, roll the windows down, but that would rarely happen anyway. I can't see myself ever twisting them back into their little carry case, but someone might. You do need to store them so that the stick side doesn't get dust or dirt on them. I highly recommend these sunshades!
customer_reviews.author: Samille Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl...NOPE
customer_reviews.text: The back of each shade is completely covered in vinyl film. That’s how they stick to the window. I didn’t even try them because I’m not going to subject my children to even more toxic air than what I already have to to put them in the car. Vinyl is quite literally poison.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark - Vision Blocked
customer_reviews.text: You get 4 window shades. 2 of them, you can see through. I put these on my front side windows. The other 2, you can NOT see through. I put these on my back side windows. I started to back out of a parking space and found I couldn't see through the shade on the back window. My vision was blocked. The shade looked completely black. I didn't want to risk getting into a car accident so I removed the very dark shades from my back side windows. Now, I just have the 2 that I can see through on my front side windows and none on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: GRAB!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! My kids were so thankful for this. It keeps the sun out completely! The suctions are my favorite part. It’s not complicated at all. Just stick on & go! NOTE: I didn’t measure my windows or nothing so I was lucky they fit! But when I gave my sister the other two, they didn’t fit. They were too big. So double check on that. I would still gives these a 5 STAR!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Tello

customer_reviews.title: Protect against glare but falls off windows frequently
customer_reviews.text: These come in two shades of darkness which help with sun glares. It’s plastic on one side which is what is supposed to stick to the window. It doesn’t work very well-it’s really hard to get it to stick during the winter. I’ve never been able to get them to fold back into the smaller shape. I ended up storing them fully open. I probably wouldn’t buy again b/c of the suction issues but otherwise decent sun protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Way too dark for back windows, or even side windows in heavy highway traffic
customer_reviews.text: Had no problem attaching to windows by following the directions enclosed. Our problem was that it's almost impossible to see traffic behind you when attached to the back window of an SUV, for the sake of privacy of an indvidual lying in back. Moreover, if you have an SUV, these wont fit the mini side windows in back for privacy purposes. They do fit the regular side windows, but will interfere with blind spots when changing lanes left or right on busy highways. For us, it was really a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. West, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These can be a bit hard to suction on depending on the size of your side window and vent window, as the shade might need to straddle both. They definitely make it hard to see out the window when you're changing lanes. The sun protection is good and it covers most of the rear window on my Mazda CX-5. I'll continue to use them when the sun is particularly bad on my car seat. I don't bother trying to fold them because it deforms them so much that suction becomes even more difficult when they're unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Will save your face from aging and skin cancers!
customer_reviews.text: I figured out my frequent skin cancers and crows feet that were only on the left side of my face was due to sun beaming in while I drove. I've tried several different devices. The ones with suction cups never stayed stuck, and the circles they left drove me crazy! I can actually put this on while driving in traffic. It just pops out and you slap it on and it stays. I can roll my window half way down reposition it and it wont blow off or out the window. Doesn't obstruct my view either. So if you're tired of holding your hand up to shade your eyes, try this. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: a great sun shade for the side windows
customer_reviews.text: a very great product. it helps protect my kid from the sun rays on the side of the car and it magically sticks in the window without the nasty trace of suction cups from other roller shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amiel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't care for these.
customer_reviews.text: Not for us. The suction was good. Easy to place on the window and easy to peel off. However, the darkest shade made it a horrible blind spot. We have lightly tinted windows, but regardless when these were placed on tinted and non tinted windows they were just too dark in my opinion. Also, they were super wrinkly and looked pretty tacky. The wrinkles didn't go away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for my car windows
customer_reviews.text: It is annoying that you have to remove it when you want to roll down the window but at least they fold up nicely. I like that they have two transparent and two blackout films. I found them useful for putting on my living room windows to block out the sun when my curtains are open. I was going to use them on my driver's windows so I didn't have to buy an extender for my visor but I probably will need one after all. They may be useful on the rear window of my car.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Get them, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about these. They were exactly what we needed for our long drive down to Disneyland. They kept the car very cool and blocked out the sun extremely well. They are a joy to use. They attach easily and remove smoothly. Easy to fold, easy to store... just easy! I love these things. My sister in-law even got a set after using our just one time. Get them, you won't regret it. If I had to find one thing to complain about it would be the size. I wish they offered different sizes but even with some overlap, they still worked perfectly. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: danny rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Quick window shade
customer_reviews.text: My wife has very sensitive eyes and often needs a window shade she can quickly move and install where she wants on a side window. They stick firmly to the window with "static cling" and remove easily with no residue. They store easily behind the car seat or even between her seat and the console. The dark shades block light and are great for the back seat or the "rear" of the front window. They are small enough the mirror is not blocked. The 'visible" shades can be seen through but still cut the bright sun. I have two sets - one for each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: The Kinder Fluff car sun shades work quite well in my KIA Soul (two front side windows) especially for blocking out the sun. I don't have children, and that isn't why I bought them. I purchased these to block out and prevent heat in my car to protect my steering wheel and internal parts of the car. These help block out the sun and make the car cooler by the time I finish work and get into my car to go home, and my steering wheel is boiling hot from the sun hitting it all day! Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dante R. Nuno

customer_reviews.title: Great for direct sunlight shade
customer_reviews.text: I use these for flying because I still need to be able to see outside but be able to cut off some of the heat from the sun. I really like how there are 2 dark shades and 2 lighter shades. When I need visibility outside the window I use the lighter shade and then when we are up at altitude I can use the darker ones. They stick very well to the glass in the plane but I have to wash them with soapy water every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Low Visibility, Potentially Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I just want to warn everyone, this greatly lowers your visibility of the outside. This is made from half fabric and half cling plastic. The wrinkles in the fabric really break up your visibility as you can see in our pictures. I've had other ones that have worked much better with the same amount of UV protection. I'll be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These things don't stick at all, total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great company.
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully. They keep the sun off me and my daughter's face and arms. I have an old model Toyota and when I purchased it it did no come with tented Windows so these help a lot. There very sturdy and easy to use, just the like the company says. The company has Excellent customer service if u have any questions a about the product. They responded very quickly and really care about customer satisfaction. Anyway I love, love, love their product. Try it u won't be sorry and if for some reason u don't, they will do their best to satisfy you. Believe me they r a nice company. I will definitely buy fr them again.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. /MetaB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these shades for a long road trip. They are easily adjustable. My 10 year old loves moving them around based on how the sun comes in. She's creative in her positioning of the shades as you can see. ☺️ We have a mini-van and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I have trouble seeing through these
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend turned me on to these because we both wear glasses and sunglasses can be a pain. He likes them ok in the car (he doesn't think they're amazing or anything) but I honestly have trouble seeing through them. I think they blur the windows a little too much and that makes it hard to see. Even the lighter shade ones just kind of seem like blurry tint to me. They are definitely good for sun protection and probably better in the back seat - I just don't think they're super safe for the front areas. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Alli Spencer-Driden

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Well... they really don't fit that well on the front door windows of my Toyota Camry. Used it once, for the wife - passenger, and I guess it got dust or something on it, so it really didn't stick again.. seems you might have to make sure the window is clean and I'm not sure how to clean the dust off the shade. When she was holding up to block the sun, she said she could still feel the sun burning her face... Hummmm
customer_reviews.author: T. Arnall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I have these for both my own vehicle and my husband’s... I have a 4-door sedan and he drives a mid-size SUV and these work for both. I wanted something simple to throw up and take down when not in use and these fit the bill. They cling right to the window with a quick press and you just peel them right down, give them a twist and can store them away in the back seat pocket or a trunk organizer. They look good on the windows too. The shades block the bright sunlight well, actually cover the window (a lot of them don’t) and stay on even when opening/closing doors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Works great and blocks out much of the sun!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those hot, sunny days you don't want to be burning in the sun while sitting in traffic. I place the 2 darker ones in the front windows and the lighter ones in the back. I can immediately feel that the car is cooler. At night, I remove them so can see clearer. The suction works surprisingly well considering one entire side is sticky so it picks up dust if you drop it. But you can just dust it off with your hand and it'll still stick well. One negative would be that because the entire side is sticky, you may get air bubbles if not applied properly.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My car felt a bit cooler
customer_reviews.text: These car sun shades seem to be keeping the temperature down in my car. I use other sun shades already because my Meds cause heat/sun sensitivity all summer long and thru the year. I just installed these new shades on the two rear windows of my Honda Civic yesterday. When I went to use my car today I paid special attention to how warm I'd feel getting into the car. I believe I felt maybe 4 or 5 degrees cooler. I will check different conditions to stay aware of how much my new shades help, but they seem okay and they stuck right from the start too. Seems like I got a winner.
customer_reviews.author: ruthieo54

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased sun shade after sun shade for my minivan. None worked. I saw this and figured I would give them a try because it came in a 4 pack. I was not disappointed! These come with a darker shade and a lighter shade. The picture I posted is the lighter shade. I pulled it right out of the pack and wanted to see if it would stick to my window. I now have them on my back windows of my minivan. They overlap each other and still stick with ease. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Car rides used to be miserable for baby and stressful for me because he'd cry nonstop. Only after getting a carseat mirror was I able to narrow down that it was the sun in his eyes making him cry (I know, rookie mistake, but forgive me; it's my first baby!). I ordered this because of its good reviews and I'm just as pleased. It came with 2 sets - one set that you can see through pretty well, and one set that's almost blackout. They're all the same size.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't block the sun very well
customer_reviews.text: I have a Subaru Outback and use one of these on the rear window where my baby's carseat is. If you have an Outback, I do not recommend these shades - or in general, I do not recommend. The coverage is pretty poor, both from a sun blocking standpoint and window shape standpoint. I feel like the sun still comes through the shade and causes my baby to squint. There are just too many uncovered areas on the window even with this shade. I'd go for something with more coverage and darker.
customer_reviews.author: RosieD123

customer_reviews.title: One shade doesn't block the sun
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but I don't. One shade didn't block the sun from my LO at all. I've had to rig up using two shades on one window, and while this is much better, it's still not perfect. Also, because of the way I've had to rig it up, it isn't really feasible to easily release the shade to roll down the window. I plan to keep these because I don't want the hassle of a return, and with using both shades on one window it's adequate...but definitely not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: I am not exactly sure if it has anything to do with my car model ( Nissan Murano, 2015) but I had almost no visibility from a driver’s seat while having those shades on. I don’t see any similar complaints but even in the picture I am providing, you can easily notice that the window is too dark. It made my left turns extremely dangerous. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: OF

customer_reviews.title: Not aesthetic pleasing, backseat window not fit to size
customer_reviews.text: (1) The seller definitely cares about providing best customer service, so that's good! They want good reviews. (2) As for the product itself, it's honestly not aesthetically pleasing from the inside or outside. Also, the fit depends on the car you have. I have a Prius, so it's awkwardly positioned in the backseat windows. It barely fits with my Prius, and it scrunches up when you lower the window, even cracking the window just a bit. I am asking for a refund and a return. I was hoping to have liked it, but the sizing just doesn't work for my Prius.
customer_reviews.author: Plumbum09

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing but great things to say about these!
customer_reviews.text: These shades are amazing! No moistening of the window or anything is required. They stick to the window instantly and we've peeled them off and restuck them countless times already. They're REALLY good. If they also came in a triangular shape we'd buy a set of those, as well. We'll be buying additional shades as gifts. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Keep the Direct Sun Out!
customer_reviews.text: “The 3 sunshades are all the exact same size and they work perfectly. At first it didn't seem like it would be very easy to return them to their storage pouch, but that turned out to be easier than I thought. But if you twist them a half turn and fold the two sides into each other ... the last step is turn each outer edge in opposite directions and they will reduce right down to fitting in the handy pouch. There is a video that clearly describes how to affix them to your windows that was helpful.“
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Too dark for my tinted windows :-(
customer_reviews.text: I tried these shades out for almost 2 weeks, to give it a chance, but I couldn't get comfortable with the darkness while driving. I have tinted windows, probably medium to dark tint, and both types of shades were a problem. I also didn't think about how the combination of sunglasses can also add to the vision impairment. I don't take enough road trips to make it worthwhile taking up space in the car for storage. The shades did do a good job of staying on the windows.
customer_reviews.author: peacereader

customer_reviews.title: Great product for keeping the Sun off of You
customer_reviews.text: They Cling Excellent to the window. We just used them for driving from CT to Myrtle Beach, SC & Back. So easy to take off & switch windows as the Sun's angles change. The only advice I have is to pay extra attention to your side view mirrors & don't make quick lane changes because you get used to seeing them in your peripheral vision & sometimes there is also a light colored car along side you on Multiple lane highways. I do not use them while just driving around town because of this distraction. But Well worth the $$$$ & We will not travel on Highways without them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great. So easy to instal and move from one window to another
customer_reviews.text: I really like these so far. I've had them for a little less than a month, but they stick to the windows easily. I didn't realize when I ordered that two are darker (let in less sun) than the other two. It's nice to have a variation between the front windows and back windows. My only issue is that I live in Phoenix AZ and the summers get up to 115. On hot days at 110 so far the ones in direct sun won't stick after being parked for an hour. Not too bad for the cost, but wished they held on in the hot sun a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Suzq1212

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I didn't buy this at the beginning of the summer. After a hot, sunny and rainless summer - I found these shades. They are great! and very easy to put on your car windows, as well as remove. Just follow the directions and they will work perfectly. I like that they are blocking out damaging UV rays, while helping me to feel more comfortable in the car while driving. These shades come with a compact case that is ideal for keeping them in optimum condition when not in use. You get three shades in this pack.
customer_reviews.author: bostonkaaren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have very fair skinned twin baby boys and needed to keep the sun off them in the car. I thought based on the reviews this product would work. It does not. It comes with 2 sets of stick on shades. One darker and one not as dark. The darker shades created an awful blind spot. I couldn’t see through it at all. The not as dark one is a little better but still pretty tough to see through. It also doesn’t really keep the sun off my babies. They do stick very well but overall I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out the sun
customer_reviews.text: This window shade really works! Unfortunately, I think I ordered the wrong size for our GMC Yukon, as the sun shade is too small and only covers about 75% of the passenger side window. Fortunately, it came in 4 pack (2 that are darker, 2 that is less darker), so I just put 1 darker and 1 less dark on one window. The vinyl stick on works relatively well, and does come off every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: madjava1592

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and options
customer_reviews.text: Ok after trying these out and being super reluctant, these have worked well! I’m Not sure how long they will actually last and haven’t had to unstick and re-stick yet but the block out power is impressive. Our toddler now sits happily without the sun getting in her eyes. If you have a larger car or suv these are a great size! Watch out for placement because they will completely cover your blind spot. Overall We are extremely happy with this purchase and even if they broke down in a year we would probably purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: No more suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the go drivers who don't have time to waste with suction cups on those old sunscreens that keep falling out of the window. These are also darker than previous models of car sunshades, I would rate the amount of light it reduces to be the same as 2 overlapping suction cup shades.The shade sicks neatly to the window with a few simple presses (of running your hand around the corners of the shade). The size is good for Honda: Civics, Accords, Vans and Toyota Prius; not too small and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: PaulL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Leave the ones on the backseat up all the time. I pull the front ones off daily when I am going to drive. The amount of sun it blocked in the summer was amazing. This plus a windshield blocker you could notice a difference in temp from when the windows were not covered and when they were. Makes it nice and cozy too in terms of brightness. I eat lunch in my car a lot. For privacy and heat reasons I love these. Folding it can be a pain though so I usually tuck them in my seat pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with them.
customer_reviews.text: I used one the other day for the first time. I was waiting in the van while hubs went into a store which I do often as I am handicapped and getting my wheelchair in and out is to big of a deal for a quick stop. It was sunny and hot and on my side. I slapped it on the window very easily. It stayed well but with the window up I was getting too hot so I lowered my window and just propped the sun shade between my arm and the door. It worked great that way, too. I am glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction but needs a strap to hold it together when folded
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit large for the tesla model 3 driver door windows but it will work. if you leave it on the window and open teh door, it will get sucked in (because the window drops when the door opens). The suction is powerful. I mainly use this for the moon roof and it's perfect. The dark shade is a little too dark for the door windows and it will be hard to see through them when changing lanes or going through stop signs. Otherwise A+ for UV and heat protection.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Even without suction cups, the vinyl portion sticks to the window very well. Lighter shades and darker shades work just as advertised. They are a bit smaller than I thought. But if I stick one shade on driver's side window, it does not block my view of side mirror, so I guess it works out. It covers about 70% of my window of SUV.
customer_reviews.author: DannyBird

customer_reviews.title: They do not block the sun!
customer_reviews.text: These do not block the sun at all. I wish we could get our money back. We even tried to double them up on the window but wasn’t possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on off will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am highly impressed with this product I am a new mom and was going crazy looking ale everywhere for a sunshade that can protect my daughter from the sun but also that can easily be taken off without any hassle. Look no further I am a very hassle free person and with the video I can literally put it on and off with just one hand it’s that simple. It has a translucent pair and non translucent. I will definitely be buying another pair for my grandparents vehicle I was looking everywhere and hope my review helps!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems a bit flimsy like the sticky side could tear easily, but time will tell. The pouch it comes in is basically worthless as it's difficult to shove the folded shades back in. Folding them is easy just like folding your usual front windshield shades, but I leave them unfolded as they wrinkle and some of the edges don't lay flat on the window. The size is a bit inadequate -- it leaves much of the window uncovered, but it's better than nothing in the Arizona sun I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: WEIRD SHAPE MAKES IT NOT AS FUNCTIONAL; NICE DARK FILM ON ONE SET OF SHADES
customer_reviews.text: The shape of the shade is not ideal compared to the last set of window shades I bought from another company (those did not block enough light, but the shape was far better); and therefore, they are less functional than they should be. The plus is that one set of the shades is backed with a dark window film which is very nice to have (but not meant to use for the driver's side while driving) and no suctions cups are needed. Someone is missing the opportunity to create custom versions of these that are designed for each make/model of car (like the folding windshield shade I have that fits PERFECTLY).
customer_reviews.author: SLR STAR

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Vehicle MUCH Cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Although my truck windows are slightly tinted, it gets really hot in the back bench area. The front passengers stay freezing while the back passengers die from the heat. On a recent vacation through the Deep South, we put two of these shades up on the back passenger windows and it made a HUGE difference. I seriously did not think it would be possible to cool down the back but it did. Very easy to put on. My son practically just tossed them on the window. Very easy to remove and store. You can see through them but through the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: CampGolfEat

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product!!! My husband has been very ill and riding in the car with the sun beating on him makes him very uncomfortable. I happen to find thee, read the reviews and thought I'll give them a try. Received them on time and what a great produce! Very easy to put on your window, and if you screw it up, you can take it off and do it again! Great price, you get 3 and a cute little case for the extra's! So far I have not been able to "fold" the extras up to fit in the case, but I don't really care, they work great!!! Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Gert

customer_reviews.title: The BEST window shades!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST sun shades! I have tried them all, the pull down (various brands), the film that’s supposed to cling to the window, etc. None have gone up so easily and given good coverage. We have an SUV, so the windows to my kids’ seats are wider. Until I bought these, I hadn’t found anything that covered the majority of the width of the window. Love them and have already purchased several sets for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C.

customer_reviews.title: Really works, easy to apply and remove.
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! It sticks to the window without suction cups and is very easy to apply and remove. It comes with 2 solid dark shades, great for kids in the rear seats. (It black your view on the blind spot, doesn't bother me as I have blind spot mirrors) The 2 other shades are see through. But it still does a good job to reduce the annoyance of the sun when shinning directly to your eyes. You can even use it on the front windows and it won't block your view. (It probably wouldn't block your view of the blind spot when using it in the rear seats)
customer_reviews.author: Zevy

customer_reviews.title: GREATPRODUCT! Works super for keeping  sun off passengers & PETS!  AlSO Read MORE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep the sun off my TheraPY DOG. I had not expected that it would also help with my PTSD BUT THEY DO!!!! I was in a car accident many years ago where the other driver T -Boned my car. SADLY, HE DIED IN THE ACCIDENT. I have suffered severe trauma as a passenger since then. THE USE OF THESE HAS REDUCED SIGNIFIANTLY THE TRAUMA I feel when traveling. I CAN'T THANK YOU ENOUGH...GREAT SERVICE and DOUBLY BENEFICIAL WOW!
customer_reviews.author: suzyQ

product_meta.title: Kinder Fluff Car Window Shade (4px)-The only Certified Sunshade blocking 99.79% of UVA & 99.95% of UVB-120 GSM Sun shades w/ 15S film.(Mom’s Choice Gold Awards Winner) sunshades for car, truck,van,SUV
feature_bullets: 😍Darkest Possible-The only brand with CERTIFIED semi-transparent sunshade. The highest protection
🤗Bigger Quantity-2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent sun shades & a free storage pouch
👍Highest Quality-The only brand with15s static – protective Film paired with 120 GSM mesh
😱Overlap to fit any window size.Driver side, windshield also large windows like SUVs,minivans
😉20'x12' car window shades, install&fold in seconds without any suction cups or adhesives.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars10,374 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
